question: What is the name of the public awareness campaign program on Ayurveda organised recently by the All-India Institute of Ayurveda?
explanation:
Recently, the All-India Institute of Ayurveda - New Delhi has conducted a large largest public awareness campaign program on Ayurveda and Covid 19 pandemic and it has been named as “Ayu Samvad”.
This campaign is supported by Ministry of Ayush. More than 5 lakh lectures were organised across the country by Ayurveda Physicians, during the campaign.
